description.short: Protects the robot from all stat changes
description.full: Protects the robot's stats in battle making any attempts at changing them have no effect.

description.short: Intensifies all stat changes on the robot
description.full: Deregulates the robot's stats in battle making any stat changes to it have an extreme effect.

description.short: Reverses all stat changes on the robot
description.full: Regulates the robot's stats in battle and makes any stat changes inflicted on them have an opposite effect.

description.short: [dynamic] Protects the robot from stat reduction
description.full: Protects the robot's favourite stat in battle making any attempts to reduce it have no effect.

description.short: The robot copies the target's positive stat changes
description.full: The robot automatically copies positive stat changes on the opponent at the end of each turn.

description.short: Increases the robot's stat boost powers
description.full: Increases the effectiveness of stat boosts granted by the robot's abilities to twice their usual power.

description.short: Increases the robot's stat break powers
description.full: Increases the effectiveness of stat breaks inflicted by the robot's abilities to twice their usual power.

description.short: [dynamic] The robot can inflict elemental damage without resistance
description.full: The robot is able to inflict elemental damage on targets without regard to resistances or negative multipliers.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: Deals extra damage when the target has a weakness
description.full: The robot puts effort into doing more damage when it knows the target has a weakness to one of its moves.

description.short: Steals weapon energy from the target when dealing damage
description.full: The robot steals a bit of weapon energy from the target whenever they successfully deal damage using an ability.

description.short: Improves the robot's targeting capabilities
description.full: Improves the robot's targeting capabilities allowing them to reach even benched robots with most abilities.

description.short: Improves the robot's charging capabilities
description.full: Improves the robot's charging capabilities allowing them to skip the charging phase of some abilities.

description.short: Survives one-hit knockouts with a sliver of energy remaining
description.full: If the robot has full energy and is hit with an ability that should knock it out, it will instead endure with a sliver of health remaining.

description.short: Generates multiple field hazards at a time
description.full: Allows the robot to generate multiple field hazards at once when using abilities.

description.short: Protects itself with Super Blocks at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot places a Super Block at its current position at the end of any turn it is not already protected by one.

description.short: The robot protects benched allies from being targeted
description.full: The robot's defensive prowess protects benched allies from being targeted by the opponent's abilities.

description.short: Prevents the use of recovery moves on the field
description.full: The robot nullifies the effects of all life and weapon energy recovery moves so long as it remains on the field.

description.short: Prevents the use of priority moves on the field
description.full: The robot's adept timekeeping skills prevent priority moves from working as long as they're still on the field.

description.short: Reveals the target's abilities when scanning
description.full: Improves the robot's scanning capabilities allowing them to see even the target's abilities when scanning.

description.short: Afflicts the active target with a weakness when face-to-face
description.full: The robot afflicts the active target with a weakness to its own core type when standing face-to-face.

description.short: Allows other robots to switch freely when this one's on the bench
description.full: The robot allows teammates to switch freely to and from active position but only when this robot is on the bench.

description.short: Reduces the cost of abilities matching the user's core to only one unit
description.full: The robot's wellspring of elemental energy reduces the cost of abilities matching their own core type for everyone on the team.

description.short: The robot nullifies attack stat changes at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any attack stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

description.short: The robot nullifies defense stat changes at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any defense stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

description.short: The robot nullifies speed stat changes at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any speed stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

description.short: The robot disables opposing core shield at the start of each turn
description.full: The robot disarms and removes opposing core shields at the start of each turn and delays their regeneration.

description.short: The robot frees itself of field hazards at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot uses its skills to remove any negative field hazards affecting it at the end of each turn.

description.short: The robot disables hazardous explosives at the end of the turn
description.full: The robot employs expert knowledge of munitions to disarm any nearby explosives at the end of each turn.

description.short: The robot neutralizes hazardous material at the end of the turn
description.full: The robot employs expert sanitization techniques to clean up any hazardous materials at the end of each turn.

description.short: Boosts attack from the bench at the end of each turn
description.full: This robot boosts the active robot's attack stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

description.short: Boosts defense from the bench at the end of each turn
description.full: This robot boosts the active robot's defense stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

description.short: Boosts speed from the bench at the end of each turn
description.full: This robot boosts the active robot's speed stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

description.short: Heals allies from the bench at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot restores lost health to wounded robots at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

description.short: Restores depleted weapons from the bench at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot fully restores depleted weapon energies at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

description.short: Allows the use of consumable items multiple times
description.full: The robot is able to recycle previously consumed items into new forms for itself and allies before each turn.

description.short: [dynamic] Gives one ally a consumable item at end-of-turn phase
description.full: The robot gives an ally-in-need a consumable item at the end of the turn.  The exact item depends on required parameters that must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: Slows down to rest and recover lost health at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot takes a break in the middle of battle to recover lost health but loses some speed in doing so.

description.short: [dynamic] Boosts a stat at battle-start phase
description.full: The robot's stat is automatically boosted at the start of battle, possibly when certain conditions are met.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] Boosts a stat at end-of-turn phase
description.full: The robot's stat is automatically boosted at the end of the turn, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] Boosts a stat when disabling a target
description.full: The robot's stat is automatically boosted after a successfull knockout, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] The robot's stat is boosted when certain robots are nearby
description.full: The robot's preferred stat is boosted by the presence of specific robots on the field. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] The robot's stat is boosted when core type is nearby
description.full: The robot's preferred stat is boosted by the presence of other robots on the field with a specific core types. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] Boosts a field multiplier at battle-start phase
description.full: The robot automatically boosts a field multiplier at the start of battle, possibly when certain conditions are met.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] Boosts a field multiplier at end-of-turn phase
description.full: The robot automatically boosts a field multiplier at the end of the turn, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

description.short: [dynamic] Randomly finds items at end-of-turn phase
description.full: The robot may randomly find an item at the end of the turn given provided parameters.  Found items are automatically added to the player's inventory.  Does not trigger in challenges, endless mode, or player battles.

description.short: Reduces weapon energy used by abilities
description.full: Reduces the weapon energy consumed by the robot when using elemental abilities by up to half.

description.short: Restores extra weapon energy at the end of each turn
description.full: The robot restores depleted weapon energy by up to half at the end of each turn in battle.

description.short: Adapts weaknesses to match upcoming abilities
description.full: The robot adapts its weaknesses before using an ability to match those of the ability's original owner.

description.short: Protects the robot from Neutral type damage
description.full: The robot's armour completely protects it from Neutral type attack damage.

description.short: Protects the robot from elemental damage
description.full: The robot's armour completely protects it from elemental attack damage.

description.short: Allows native use of Cutter-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Cutter-type abilities as if they were a Cutter-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Impact-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Impact-type abilities as if they were an Impact-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Freeze-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Freeze-type abilities as if they were a Freeze-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Explode-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Explode-type abilities as if they were an Explode-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Flame-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Flame-type abilities as if they were a Flame-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Electric-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Electric-type abilities as if they were an Electric-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Time-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Time-type abilities as if they were a Time-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Earth-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Earth-type abilities as if they were an Earth-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Wind-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Wind-type abilities as if they were a Wind-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Water-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Water-type abilities as if they were a Water-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Swift-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Swift-type abilities as if they were a Swift-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Nature-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Nature-type abilities as if they were a Nature-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Missile-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Missile-type abilities as if they were a Missile-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Crystal-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Crystal-type abilities as if they were a Crystal-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Shadow-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Shadow-type abilities as if they were a Shadow-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Space-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Space-type abilities as if they were a Space-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Shield-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Shield-type abilities as if they were a Shield-core.

description.short: Allows native use of Laser-type abilities
description.full: Allows the robot to equip and use Laser-type abilities as if they were a Laser-core.

description.short: This is not a real skill.  It exists to be overwritten.
description.full: The robot has a skill so specific it cannot be applied to other robots.  This custom skill placeholder thus needs to be overwritten with custom text.
